title: OneDrive: Catch up with Copilot
description: With Copilot, you will be able to catch up on important updates such as a summary of new "at" mentions that need your attention, new changes made to files you've been active in, and quick snippets of new files shared with you. Catch up will be available in OneDrive Web for our commercial customers and requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license. Catch up will initially work for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files.
